title: Tsai Jiao Shu Fang
description: Sign is only in Chinese so look for 彩椒廚房 which translate to colored peppers kitchen. Or look for 素食 which is vegetarian. Menu has English and indicates which items contain dairy. Offers noodles, hot pots, rice in hot rock bowl, rice with vegetables and mock meat, and side dishes like stinky tofu or faux chicken. A dish costs around NT$100+.
streetAddress: 1, Alley 5, Lane 74, Wenzhou Street, Daan District
